SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BookWindow
In this Window the client selects both the amount of people and days for the reservation.
ClientInfo
Class used to represent the information given by clients on the payment info screen.
ClientInfoDAO
 
Date
Class used to store Dates, in Day, Month, Year format
Hotel
The Hotel class will manage all the rooms and their reservations.
Main
 
MainWindow
Main Window, from here you can go to either the stafflogin window or the book window.
ManagerWindow
This Window is for the Manager, in this case, Oshiro (username Oshiro, password Farewell) Here you can do everything you can on the Staff Window and more! Most notably Oshiro can add new Staff into the system by setting their username and password.
PaymentDataWindow
In this window the price of the reservation is calculated and some things are determined: the start date of the reservation (which when added with its duration also give us the end date) and the ckient's information.
Reservation
The class Reservation will keep track of all the relevant information for each reservation, most notably their start and end Dates.
ReservationDAO
Class used to access HotelClients.Reservations Table.
Room
The Room class is here to keep track of every reservation within each room, as well as their type.
RoomSelectWindow
In this window the type of room the client wishes to book is decided, some rooms will not be available for a certain amount of people.
SQLDatabase
Class used to connect to the SQL Database, every DAO class extends this one.
StaffLoginDAO
 
StaffLoginWindow
This window asks for a username and a password.
StaffWindow
This Window is for the Staff, Here you can check how many rooms have some reservation, how many staff are registered in the database and which reservations are linked to a certain cpf.
